Styles.ToneOfVoice: <p>These lightweight and breathable trousers are easy to style with any casual look, featuring a linen blend construction, an elasticated waistband with an adjustable drawstring, a wide leg and dual side pockets.</p><ul><li>Wide leg</li><li>Lightweight</li><li>Linen-blend</li><li>Elasticated waistband</li><li>Adjustable drawstring</li><li>Dual side pockets</li></ul>

Items.SearchDescription: Black Tie Waist Wide Leg Trousers with Linen

Logos.Name: TALLT
Logos.Description: Styles available in our tall range can be identified by this symbol. These styles have been made to suit women 5' 10" (177.5cm) or taller in sizes 8-20. Extra length is added in the sleeve, body and length of garments.

Logos.Name: CURVE
Logos.Description: This symbol indicates that this must-have style is available in additional sizes.  Shop all your favourites from our perfect-fit Curve collection.
